Monthly Group Meditation (Sathsang)
 

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

The Isha Monthly Group Meditation is an opportunity to deepen your Kriya with Sadhguru's voice guiding you through the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya. Here are the details of our upcoming Sathsang:
Date & Time: Saturday, March 11, 5 pm - 7:15 pm
Melbourne (Please note change in venue)
Drill Hall, Multicultural Hub, 26 Therry St, Melbourne VIC 3004
Sydney (Please note change in venue)
The Great Hall, Sydney Boys High School
11 Anzac Parade, Moore Park, NSW 2021 (enter via Anzac Parade)
Brisbane
Slacks Creek Progress Hall, 151 - 153 Barbaralla Drive, Springwood
Perth
Corinthian Park Hall, Cnr Beatrice Ave & Leach Hwy, Shelley, WA, 6148

Please ensure that

  • you are on empty stomach
  • you are seated in the hall at least 15 minutes before the start time as late comers will not be permitted.

Inner Engineering Online participants
Please be outside the hall door no later than 35 minutes following the start of the session in order to join the Sathsang after the completion of the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya practice.

* Please note that Sathsang will be conducted on the second Saturday of every month across centers in Australia.

Practice Correction Webinar
 

For the first time, we will be offering a practice Q&A session, on Sunday, March 12th through a webinar, to better support you in establishing your Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya. This is an opportunity for you to have your questions or concerns clarified by a trained teacher.

Please note: This session is open to those of you who have completed the Inner Engineering program and have been initiated into the Shambhavi Mahamudra Kriya.

Date & Time: Sunday, March 12, 8 pm to 9 pm (AEDT)
Registration: isha.clickwebinar.com/inner-engineering-practice-correction/

Introduction to Inner Engineering - Webinar
 

We are delighted to announce that we will be conducting a free introductory webinar for Inner Engineering.

Date & Time: Saturday, 11 March, 8 pm (AEDT)
Registration: isha.clickwebinar.com/intro-to-inner-engineering/
